_sText:
This type of map is for sliderace.
If you don't know what that is give it a try and find out for yourself. "Hidden" around the map are 5 different types of weapons that when picked up with open a door that will give players access to a HE Grenade which will give the player who carries it HP Regen, though the trail it leaves can be annoying. Good luck with finishing the map its fairly easy, though may be confusing on the first shots. After a bit of practice it should be one of the easiest slide maps, yet still fun to play.
